domosaics.ui.views.view
Class ViewActionManager

java.lang.Object
  domosaics.ui.io.menureader.DefaultMenuActionManager
      domosaics.ui.views.view.ViewActionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuActionManager
public class ViewActionManager
extends DefaultMenuActionManager

The view specific action manager extending the DefaultMenuActionManager from MenuReader. This manager provides all loaded actions for the view specific menu like the DDefaultActionManager does, but also provides the method to retrieve all actions at once.
This is useful when changing into ZoomMode and checking for each action if it should still be active.

Author:
Andreas Held
